org.openntf.domino.ext

Interface ColorObject

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ColorObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColorObject

    public interface ColorObject
    Author:
    withersp OpenNTF Domino extensions to ColorObject

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getHex()
      Gets the ColorObject's color as a hex value, standard for web development.
      void setHex(String hex)
      Sets a ColorObject to a specific color using hex format, standard for web development.

    • Method Detail

      • getHex

        String getHex()
        Gets the ColorObject's color as a hex value, standard for web development.
        Returns:
        String corresponding to the hex value for the color, following RGB format, e.g.
        • 000000 for black
        • FFFFFF for white
        • FF0000 for red
        • 0000FF for blue
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 1.0.0

      • setHex

        void setHex(String hex)
        Sets a ColorObject to a specific color using hex format, standard for web development.
        Parameters:
        hex - String corresponding to the hex value for the color, following RGB format, e.g.
        • 000000 for black
        • FFFFFF for white
        • FF0000 for red
        • 0000FF for blue
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 1.0.0
